name: (Don'tsay)IHateYou
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i hate you
des: We live in a world with voice assistants everywhere we look. Have you ever taken a step back and thought about how you treat Alexa, Siri, or Cortana? Enable I Hate You to keep yourself in check. This skill will prevent Alexa from taking abuse and help keep you in check. Remember to treat your voice assistants how you want to be treated. Anybody can benefit by enabling this skill. Also see our suite of related skills including ShutUp
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
